pullRequest.title: FISH-322 Update Email Notifier to New API
pullRequest.bodyText:
Renamed the email-notifier-configure command to the more common set-
syntax.
Renamed the ambiguous 'to' option to 'recipient'.
Fixed remaining compilation issues

The following PRs will be to remove this notifier and put it in the new suite. This PR is here for simplicity so that the code can be reviewed in one place before it's moved to the new repo.

commit.message:
FISH-322 Update Email Notifier to New API

- Renamed the email-notifier-configure command to the more common set-
syntax.
- Renamed the ambiguous 'to' option to 'recipient'.
- Fixed remaining compilation issues

Signed-off-by: Matthew Gill <matthew.gill@live.co.uk>
